<div class="donate">
	<div class="lc">
		<h2>Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
		<div class="donate-messaging-text">
			<p>Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.</p>
		</div>
		<form method="post" action="#" class="donate-form">
				<fieldset class="donate-step donate-range-container" id="donate-step-1">
					<legend><span class="form-step">1</span> Choose an amount to donate:</legend>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="donate-range" class="field-instruction is-vishidden">Choose amount to donate</label>
						<input type="number" data-type="range" class="donate-range ui-slider-input" id="donate-range" value="1" min="1" max="100" />
						<div class="donate-slider-message">Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.</div>
					</div>
					<div class="field-container checkbox-container">
						<input type="checkbox" id="donate-monthly" />
						<label for="donate-monthly">Yes, I would like to donate this amount monthly</label>
					</div>
					<a href="#donate-step-2" class="btn">Next Step</a>
				</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

				<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-2">
					<legend><span class="form-step">2</span> Enter your information:</legend>
					<div class="g g-2up">
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-name">Name</label>
							<input type="text" id="donate-name" placeholder="First Last" autocomplete="off" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-email">E-mail</label>
							<input type="email" id="donate-email" placeholder="your@email.com" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-address">Address</label>
							<input type="text" id="donate-address" placeholder="123 Main St" autocomplete="off" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-address-2">Address 2</label>
							<input type="text" id="donate-address-2" placeholder="Apt #, Suite, etc" autocomplete="off" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-city">City</label>
							<input type="text" id="donate-city" placeholder="Pittsburgh" autocomplete="off" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-state">State</label>
							<select id="donate-state" name="donate-state" required>
								<option value="AL">Alabama</option>

						    <option value="02">02 - February</option>

						</select>
					</div>

    Awards and Press

    Intro copy about press (short and sweet)
    List of awards, honors, associations, etc
    In the news
    About section navigation
    Newsletter Signup to stay up-to-date with events
    Link to Blog

    Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank

    Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.

    1 Choose an amount to donate:
    Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.
    Next Step
    2 Enter your information:
    Next Step
    3 Enter payment information:
    Norton Secured, powered by VeriSign

    Programs

    • Produce to People
    • Community Harvest
    • SNAP
    • Farm Stand Project
    • Summer Food
    • Commodity Supplemental Food Program
    • Nutrition
    • Agency Relations
    • Educational Programs

    Contact Us

    Duquesne, PA 15110

    Stay Up to Date

    Stay informed about our organization, upcoming events, stories of lives we have touched and news that impacts what we do.

    Sign up for our newsletter
    • Like us on Facebook
    • Follow us on Twitter
    • View our videos on Youtube
    The Greater Pittsburgh Community Foodbank is a member of Feeding America
    View our Privacy Policy
    This pattern contains: templates-about-press

	<div class="lc">
		<h2>Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
		<div class="donate-messaging-text">
			<p>Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.</p>
		</div>
		<form method="post" action="#" class="donate-form">
				<fieldset class="donate-step donate-range-container" id="donate-step-1">
					<legend><span class="form-step">1</span> Choose an amount to donate:</legend>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="donate-range" class="field-instruction is-vishidden">Choose amount to donate</label>
						<input type="number" data-type="range" class="donate-range ui-slider-input" id="donate-range" value="1" min="1" max="100" />
						<div class="donate-slider-message">Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.</div>
					</div>
					<div class="field-container checkbox-container">
						<input type="checkbox" id="donate-monthly" />
						<label for="donate-monthly">Yes, I would like to donate this amount monthly</label>
					</div>
					<a href="#donate-step-2" class="btn">Next Step</a>
				</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

				<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-2">
					<legend><span class="form-step">2</span> Enter your information:</legend>
					<div class="g g-2up">
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-name">Name</label>
							<input type="text" id="donate-name" placeholder="First Last" autocomplete="off" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-email">E-mail</label>
							<input type="email" id="donate-email" placeholder="your@email.com" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-address">Address</label>
							<input type="text" id="donate-address" placeholder="123 Main St" autocomplete="off" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-address-2">Address 2</label>

						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-city">City</label>

						</div>

					</div>

						<label for="payment-cc-num">CVV Number</label>

						    <option value="02">02 - February</option>

    Events

    Food distribution, fundraisers, lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Sed, sint.

    Upcoming Events
    Info about organizing/volunteering an event
    Newsletter Signup to stay up-to-date with events

    Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank

    Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.

    1 Choose an amount to donate:
    Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.
    Next Step
    2 Enter your information:
    Next Step
    3 Enter payment information:
    Norton Secured, powered by VeriSign

    HTML

    									
										<div class="page" id="page">
	<!-- Begin .header -->
	<header class="header cf" role="banner">
	<a href="/"><img src="../../images/logo.gif" class="logo" alt="Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank" /></a>		<a href="#search-form" class="nav-toggle nav-toggle-search icon-search"><span class="is-vishidden">Search</span></a>
		<a href="#nav" class="nav-toggle nav-toggle-menu icon-menu"><span class="is-vishidden">Menu</span></a>
	<form action="#" method="post" class="inline-form search-form">           
	    <fieldset>
		    <legend class="is-vishidden">Search</legend>

		    </button>
	    </fieldset>
	</form>	<nav id="nav" class="nav" role="navigation">

					<li><a href="#">Volunteer</a></li>

					<li><a href="#">Kids</a></li>
				</ul>
			</li>
			<li class="nav-li">
				<a href="#" class="nav-subnav-link">About<span class="icon-arrow-down5"></span></a>
				<ul class="nav-subnav">
					<li><a href="#">About Us</a></li>
					<li><a href="#">Operations</a></li>

	</header>
	<!-- End .header -->	<div role="main">

<div class="donate">
	<div class="lc">
		<h2>Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
		<div class="donate-messaging-text">
			<p>Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.</p>
		</div>
		<form method="post" action="#" class="donate-form">
				<fieldset class="donate-step donate-range-container" id="donate-step-1">
					<legend><span class="form-step">1</span> Choose an amount to donate:</legend>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="donate-range" class="field-instruction is-vishidden">Choose amount to donate</label>
						<input type="number" data-type="range" class="donate-range ui-slider-input" id="donate-range" value="1" min="1" max="100" />
						<div class="donate-slider-message">Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.</div>
					</div>
					<div class="field-container checkbox-container">
						<input type="checkbox" id="donate-monthly" />
						<label for="donate-monthly">Yes, I would like to donate this amount monthly</label>
					</div>
					<a href="#donate-step-2" class="btn">Next Step</a>
				</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

				<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-2">

						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-name">Name</label>

						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-email">E-mail</label>
							<input type="email" id="donate-email" placeholder="your@email.com" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-address">Address</label>
							<input type="text" id="donate-address" placeholder="123 Main St" autocomplete="off" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-address-2">Address 2</label>

						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-city">City</label>
							<input type="text" id="donate-city" placeholder="Pittsburgh" autocomplete="off" required />
						</div>

							<label for="donate-state">State</label>

    Event Detail

    Will probably look like a blog post

    Event Detail Information
    More upcoming events
    Info about organizing/volunteering an event
    Newsletter Signup to stay up-to-date with events

    Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank

    Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.

    1 Choose an amount to donate:
    Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.
    Next Step
    2 Enter your information:
    Next Step
    3 Enter payment information:
    Norton Secured, powered by VeriSign

    • Community Harvest
    • SNAP
    • Farm Stand Project
    • Summer Food
    • Commodity Supplemental Food Program

    Contact Us

    Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank
    1 North Linden Street
    Duquesne, PA 15110
    412-460-3663 Email us

    Stay Up to Date

    Stay informed about our organization, upcoming events, stories of lives we have touched and news that impacts what we do.

    Sign up for our newsletter
    • Like us on Facebook
    • Follow us on Twitter
    • View our videos on Youtube
    The Greater Pittsburgh Community Foodbank is a member of Feeding America
    View our Privacy Policy

<div class="donate">
	<div class="lc">

							<input type="email" id="donate-email" placeholder="your@email.com" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-address">Address</label>
							<input type="text" id="donate-address" placeholder="123 Main St" autocomplete="off" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-address-2">Address 2</label>
							<input type="text" id="donate-address-2" placeholder="Apt #, Suite, etc" autocomplete="off" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-city">City</label>
							<input type="text" id="donate-city" placeholder="Pittsburgh" autocomplete="off" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-state">State</label>
							<select id="donate-state" name="donate-state" required>
								<option value="AL">Alabama</option>
								<option value="AK">Alaska</option>
								<option value="AZ">Arizona</option>
								<option value="AR">Arkansas</option>
								<option value="CA">California</option>
								<option value="CO">Colorado</option>
								<option value="CT">Connecticut</option>
								<option value="DE">Delaware</option>
								<option value="DC">District of Columbia</option>
								<option value="FL">Florida</option>
								<option value="GA">Georgia</option>
								<option value="HI">Hawaii</option>
								<option value="ID">Idaho</option>
								<option value="IL">Illinois</option>
								<option value="IN">Indiana</option>
								<option value="IA">Iowa</option>
								<option value="KS">Kansas</option>
								<option value="KY">Kentucky</option>
								<option value="LA">Louisiana</option>
								<option value="ME">Maine</option>
								<option value="MD">Maryland</option>
								<option value="MA">Massachusetts</option>
								<option value="MI">Michigan</option>
								<option value="MN">Minnesota</option>
								<option value="MS">Mississippi</option>
								<option value="MO">Missouri</option>
								<option value="MT">Montana</option>
								<option value="NE">Nebraska</option>
								<option value="NV">Nevada</option>
								<option value="NH">New Hampshire</option>
								<option value="NJ">New Jersey</option>
								<option value="NM">New Mexico</option>
								<option value="NY">New York</option>
								<option value="NC">North Carolina</option>
								<option value="ND">North Dakota</option>
								<option value="OH">Ohio</option>
								<option value="OK">Oklahoma</option>
								<option value="OR">Oregon</option>
								<option value="PA" selected="selected">Pennsylvania</option>
								<option value="RI">Rhode Island</option>
								<option value="SC">South Carolina</option>
								<option value="SD">South Dakota</option>
								<option value="TN">Tennessee</option>
								<option value="TX">Texas</option>
								<option value="UT">Utah</option>
								<option value="VT">Vermont</option>
								<option value="VA">Virginia</option>
								<option value="WA">Washington</option>
								<option value="WV">West Virginia</option>
								<option value="WI">Wisconsin</option>
								<option value="WY">Wyoming</option>
							</select>
						</div>
					</div><!--end .g-2up-->
					<a href="#donate-step-3" class="btn">Next Step</a>
				</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

				<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-3">
					<legend><span class="form-step">3</span> Enter payment information:</legend>
					<div class="field-container radio-container">
						<input type="radio" name="payment-type" id="payment-cc" /><label for="payment-cc">Credit Card</label>
						<input type="radio" name="payment-type" id="payment-bank" /><label for="payment-bank">Bank Account</label>
					</div>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="payment-cc-num">Credit Card Number</label>
						<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="payment-cc-num" placeholder="Enter Credit Card Number" required />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="payment-cc-num">CVV Number</label>
						<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="payment-cc-cvv" placeholder="123" required />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="payment-cc-month">Expiration Month</label>
						<select id="payment-cc-month" required />
							<option value="00">Choose Month</option>
							<option value="01">01 - January</option>
						    <option value="02">02 - February</option>
						    <option value="03">03 - March</option>
						    <option value="04">04 - April</option>
						    <option value="05">05 - May</option>
						    <option value="06">06 - June</option>
						    <option value="07">07 - July</option>
						    <option value="08">08 - August</option>
						    <option value="09">09 - September</option>
						    <option value="10">10 - October</option>
						    <option value="11">11 - November</option>
						    <option value="12">12 - December</option>
						</select>
					</div>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="payment-cc-month">Expiration Year</label>
						<select id="payment-cc-month" required />
							<option value="00">Choose Year</option>
							<option value="2014">2014</option>
						    <option value="2015">2015</option>
						    <option value="2016">2016</option>
						    <option value="2017">2017</option>
						    <option value="2018">2018</option>
						    <option value="2019">2019</option>
						    <option value="2019">2020</option>
						</select>
					</div>
					<div class="message">
						Norton Secured, powered by VeriSign
					</div>
					<button class="donate-submit btn">Submit Donation</button>
				</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
		</form><!--end .donate-form-->
	</div><!-- end .lc-->
</div><!-- end .donate-slider-->
	<!-- Begin Footer -->
	<footer class="footer" role="contentinfo">

    Donate

    Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.

    Donate module
    Stats about where money goes, who donations help, etc
    Donate food info
    Planned giving info
    Store link
    Volunteer tout ("Can't make a financial donation? Donate your time!" etc)
    Newsletter Signup to stay up-to-date with events

    Contact Us

    Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank
    1 North Linden Street
    Duquesne, PA 15110
    412-460-3663 Email us

    Stay Up to Date

    Stay informed about our organization, upcoming events, stories of lives we have touched and news that impacts what we do.

    • Follow us on Twitter
    • View our videos on Youtube

    Get Involved

    Help eradicate hunger in southwestern PA lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.

    Volunteer
    Donate
    Organize
    Advocate
    Get Informed
    Newsletter Signup

    Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank

    Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.

    1 Choose an amount to donate:
    Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.
    Next Step
    2 Enter your information:
    Next Step
    3 Enter payment information:
    Norton Secured, powered by VeriSign

    Programs

    • Produce to People
    • Community Harvest
    • SNAP
    • Farm Stand Project
    • Summer Food
    • Commodity Supplemental Food Program
    • Nutrition
    • Agency Relations
    • Educational Programs

    Contact Us

    Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank
    1 North Linden Street
    Duquesne, PA 15110
    412-460-3663 Email us

    Stay Up to Date

    Stay informed about our organization, upcoming events, stories of lives we have touched and news that impacts what we do.

    Sign up for our newsletter
    • Like us on Facebook
    • Follow us on Twitter
    • View our videos on Youtube
    The Greater Pittsburgh Community Foodbank is a member of Feeding America
    View our Privacy Policy
    This pattern contains: templates-get-involved-landing

    HTML

	<form action="#" method="post" class="inline-form search-form">

		    <legend class="is-vishidden">Search</legend>

<div class="donate">
	<div class="lc">
		<h2>Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
		<div class="donate-messaging-text">
			<p>Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.</p>
		</div>
		<form method="post" action="#" class="donate-form">
				<fieldset class="donate-step donate-range-container" id="donate-step-1">
					<legend><span class="form-step">1</span> Choose an amount to donate:</legend>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="donate-range" class="field-instruction is-vishidden">Choose amount to donate</label>
						<input type="number" data-type="range" class="donate-range ui-slider-input" id="donate-range" value="1" min="1" max="100" />
						<div class="donate-slider-message">Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.</div>
					</div>
					<div class="field-container checkbox-container">
						<input type="checkbox" id="donate-monthly" />
						<label for="donate-monthly">Yes, I would like to donate this amount monthly</label>
					</div>
					<a href="#donate-step-2" class="btn">Next Step</a>
				</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

				<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-2">
					<legend><span class="form-step">2</span> Enter your information:</legend>
					<div class="g g-2up">
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-name">Name</label>
							<input type="text" id="donate-name" placeholder="First Last" autocomplete="off" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-email">E-mail</label>
							<input type="email" id="donate-email" placeholder="your@email.com" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-address">Address</label>
							<input type="text" id="donate-address" placeholder="123 Main St" autocomplete="off" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-address-2">Address 2</label>
							<input type="text" id="donate-address-2" placeholder="Apt #, Suite, etc" autocomplete="off" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-city">City</label>
							<input type="text" id="donate-city" placeholder="Pittsburgh" autocomplete="off" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-state">State</label>
							<select id="donate-state" name="donate-state" required>
								<option value="AL">Alabama</option>

								<option value="AZ">Arizona</option>

						</div>
					</div><!--end .g-2up-->
					<a href="#donate-step-3" class="btn">Next Step</a>
				</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

				<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-3">
					<legend><span class="form-step">3</span> Enter payment information:</legend>
					<div class="field-container radio-container">
						<input type="radio" name="payment-type" id="payment-cc" /><label for="payment-cc">Credit Card</label>
						<input type="radio" name="payment-type" id="payment-bank" /><label for="payment-bank">Bank Account</label>
					</div>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="payment-cc-num">Credit Card Number</label>
						<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="payment-cc-num" placeholder="Enter Credit Card Number" required />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="payment-cc-num">CVV Number</label>
						<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="payment-cc-cvv" placeholder="123" required />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="payment-cc-month">Expiration Month</label>
						<select id="payment-cc-month" required />
							<option value="00">Choose Month</option>
							<option value="01">01 - January</option>
						    <option value="02">02 - February</option>
						    <option value="03">03 - March</option>
						    <option value="04">04 - April</option>
						    <option value="05">05 - May</option>
						    <option value="06">06 - June</option>
						    <option value="07">07 - July</option>
						    <option value="08">08 - August</option>
						    <option value="09">09 - September</option>
						    <option value="10">10 - October</option>
						    <option value="11">11 - November</option>
						    <option value="12">12 - December</option>
						</select>
					</div>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="payment-cc-month">Expiration Year</label>
						<select id="payment-cc-month" required />
							<option value="00">Choose Year</option>
							<option value="2014">2014</option>
						    <option value="2015">2015</option>
						    <option value="2016">2016</option>
						    <option value="2017">2017</option>
						    <option value="2018">2018</option>
						    <option value="2019">2019</option>
						    <option value="2019">2020</option>
						</select>
					</div>
					<div class="message">
						Norton Secured, powered by VeriSign
					</div>
					<button class="donate-submit btn">Submit Donation</button>

</div><!-- end .donate-slider-->

    Volunteer

    Volunteer your time at GPCFB events Lorem ipsum.

    Contact information
    List of volunteer categories (repack, gleaning, fundraising, food drives, produce to people, clerical work)
    Volunteer Age Requirements

    Get Involved

    • Volunteer
    • Advocacy
    • Kids
    • Food Drives
    Upcoming events
    Newsletter Signup to stay up-to-date with volunteer opportunities

    Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank

    Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.

    1 Choose an amount to donate:
    Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.
    Next Step
    2 Enter your information:
    Next Step
    3 Enter payment information:
    Norton Secured, powered by VeriSign

    HTML

    									
										<div class="page" id="page">
	<!-- Begin .header -->
	<header class="header cf" role="banner">
	<a href="/"><img src="../../images/logo.gif" class="logo" alt="Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank" /></a>		<a href="#search-form" class="nav-toggle nav-toggle-search icon-search"><span class="is-vishidden">Search</span></a>

	<form action="#" method="post" class="inline-form search-form">           
	    <fieldset>
		    <legend class="is-vishidden">Search</legend>

	    </fieldset>
	</form>	<nav id="nav" class="nav" role="navigation">

					<li><a href="#">Board and Management</a></li>

					<li><a href="#">Agencies</a></li>
					<li><a href="#">Donors</a></li>
					<li><a href="#">Sponsors</a></li>
					<li><a href="#">Finances</a></li>
					<li><a href="#">Fundraising Policy</a></li>
					<li><a href="#">Awards and Press</a></li>
				</ul>
			</li>
			<li class="nav-li">
				<a href="#" class="nav-subnav-link">Resources<span class="icon-arrow-down5"></span></a>
				<ul class="nav-subnav">
					<li><a href="#">Resource Center</a></li>
					<li><a href="#">FAQ</a></li>
					<li><a href="#">About Hunger</a></li>

				</ul>

			<li class="nav-li"><a href="#">Contact</a></li>
			<li class="nav-li"><a href="#">Donate</a></li>
		</ul>
	</nav><!--end .nav-->
	</header>
	<!-- End .header -->	<div role="main">
		<div class="lc">
			<div class="page-header">
				<h1 class="page-title">Volunteer</h1>
				<p class="page-intro">Volunteer your time at GPCFB events Lorem ipsum.</p>
			</div>		</div>

<div class="donate">
	<div class="lc">
		<h2>Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
		<div class="donate-messaging-text">
			<p>Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.</p>
		</div>
		<form method="post" action="#" class="donate-form">
				<fieldset class="donate-step donate-range-container" id="donate-step-1">
					<legend><span class="form-step">1</span> Choose an amount to donate:</legend>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="donate-range" class="field-instruction is-vishidden">Choose amount to donate</label>
						<input type="number" data-type="range" class="donate-range ui-slider-input" id="donate-range" value="1" min="1" max="100" />
						<div class="donate-slider-message">Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.</div>
					</div>
					<div class="field-container checkbox-container">
						<input type="checkbox" id="donate-monthly" />
						<label for="donate-monthly">Yes, I would like to donate this amount monthly</label>
					</div>
					<a href="#donate-step-2" class="btn">Next Step</a>
				</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

    Repack

    Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank

    Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.

    1 Choose an amount to donate:
    Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.
    Next Step
    2 Enter your information:
    Next Step
    3 Enter payment information:
    Norton Secured, powered by VeriSign

    • Farm Stand Project
    • Summer Food

    • Agency Relations

    Contact Us

    Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank
    1 North Linden Street
    Duquesne, PA 15110
    412-460-3663 Email us

    Stay Up to Date

    Stay informed about our organization, upcoming events, stories of lives we have touched and news that impacts what we do.

    Sign up for our newsletter
    • Like us on Facebook
    • Follow us on Twitter
    • View our videos on Youtube
    The Greater Pittsburgh Community Foodbank is a member of Feeding America
    View our Privacy Policy

<div class="donate">
	<div class="lc">
		<h2>Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
		<div class="donate-messaging-text">
			<p>Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.</p>
		</div>
		<form method="post" action="#" class="donate-form">
				<fieldset class="donate-step donate-range-container" id="donate-step-1">
					<legend><span class="form-step">1</span> Choose an amount to donate:</legend>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="donate-range" class="field-instruction is-vishidden">Choose amount to donate</label>
						<input type="number" data-type="range" class="donate-range ui-slider-input" id="donate-range" value="1" min="1" max="100" />
						<div class="donate-slider-message">Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.</div>
					</div>
					<div class="field-container checkbox-container">
						<input type="checkbox" id="donate-monthly" />
						<label for="donate-monthly">Yes, I would like to donate this amount monthly</label>
					</div>
					<a href="#donate-step-2" class="btn">Next Step</a>
				</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

				<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-2">
					<legend><span class="form-step">2</span> Enter your information:</legend>
					<div class="g g-2up">
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-name">Name</label>
							<input type="text" id="donate-name" placeholder="First Last" autocomplete="off" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-email">E-mail</label>
							<input type="email" id="donate-email" placeholder="your@email.com" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-address">Address</label>
							<input type="text" id="donate-address" placeholder="123 Main St" autocomplete="off" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-address-2">Address 2</label>
							<input type="text" id="donate-address-2" placeholder="Apt #, Suite, etc" autocomplete="off" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-city">City</label>
							<input type="text" id="donate-city" placeholder="Pittsburgh" autocomplete="off" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-state">State</label>
							<select id="donate-state" name="donate-state" required>
								<option value="AL">Alabama</option>

							</select>
						</div>
					</div><!--end .g-2up-->
					<a href="#donate-step-3" class="btn">Next Step</a>
				</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

				<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-3">
					<legend><span class="form-step">3</span> Enter payment information:</legend>
					<div class="field-container radio-container">
						<input type="radio" name="payment-type" id="payment-cc" /><label for="payment-cc">Credit Card</label>
						<input type="radio" name="payment-type" id="payment-bank" /><label for="payment-bank">Bank Account</label>
					</div>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="payment-cc-num">Credit Card Number</label>
						<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="payment-cc-num" placeholder="Enter Credit Card Number" required />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="payment-cc-num">CVV Number</label>
						<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="payment-cc-cvv" placeholder="123" required />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="payment-cc-month">Expiration Month</label>
						<select id="payment-cc-month" required />
							<option value="00">Choose Month</option>
							<option value="01">01 - January</option>
						    <option value="02">02 - February</option>
						    <option value="03">03 - March</option>
						    <option value="04">04 - April</option>
						    <option value="05">05 - May</option>
						    <option value="06">06 - June</option>
						    <option value="07">07 - July</option>

						    <option value="09">09 - September</option>
						    <option value="10">10 - October</option>
						    <option value="11">11 - November</option>
						    <option value="12">12 - December</option>
						</select>
					</div>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="payment-cc-month">Expiration Year</label>
						<select id="payment-cc-month" required />
							<option value="00">Choose Year</option>
							<option value="2014">2014</option>
						    <option value="2015">2015</option>
						    <option value="2016">2016</option>
						    <option value="2017">2017</option>
						    <option value="2018">2018</option>

						    <option value="2019">2020</option>
						</select>
					</div>
					<div class="message">
						Norton Secured, powered by VeriSign
					</div>
					<button class="donate-submit btn">Submit Donation</button>
				</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
		</form><!--end .donate-form-->
	</div><!-- end .lc-->
</div><!-- end .donate-slider-->

    Advocacy

    Intro text (short and sweet)
    Call to Action
    Advocacy description
    Policy Priorities
    Links to resources (why end hunger? advocacy resources, etc)
    Latest Advocacy Updates from Blog

    Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank

    Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.

    1 Choose an amount to donate:
    Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.
    Next Step
    2 Enter your information:
    Next Step
    3 Enter payment information:
    Norton Secured, powered by VeriSign

    • Farm Stand Project
    • Summer Food

    Contact Us

    Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank
    1 North Linden Street
    Duquesne, PA 15110
    412-460-3663 Email us

    Stay Up to Date

    Stay informed about our organization, upcoming events, stories of lives we have touched and news that impacts what we do.

    • Follow us on Twitter

<div class="donate">

								<option value="OK">Oklahoma</option>
								<option value="OR">Oregon</option>
								<option value="PA" selected="selected">Pennsylvania</option>
								<option value="RI">Rhode Island</option>
								<option value="SC">South Carolina</option>
								<option value="SD">South Dakota</option>
								<option value="TN">Tennessee</option>
								<option value="TX">Texas</option>
								<option value="UT">Utah</option>
								<option value="VT">Vermont</option>
								<option value="VA">Virginia</option>
								<option value="WA">Washington</option>
								<option value="WV">West Virginia</option>
								<option value="WI">Wisconsin</option>
								<option value="WY">Wyoming</option>
							</select>
						</div>
					</div><!--end .g-2up-->
					<a href="#donate-step-3" class="btn">Next Step</a>
				</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

				<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-3">
					<legend><span class="form-step">3</span> Enter payment information:</legend>
					<div class="field-container radio-container">
						<input type="radio" name="payment-type" id="payment-cc" /><label for="payment-cc">Credit Card</label>
						<input type="radio" name="payment-type" id="payment-bank" /><label for="payment-bank">Bank Account</label>
					</div>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="payment-cc-num">Credit Card Number</label>
						<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="payment-cc-num" placeholder="Enter Credit Card Number" required />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="payment-cc-num">CVV Number</label>
						<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="payment-cc-cvv" placeholder="123" required />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="payment-cc-month">Expiration Month</label>
						<select id="payment-cc-month" required />
							<option value="00">Choose Month</option>
							<option value="01">01 - January</option>
						    <option value="02">02 - February</option>
						    <option value="03">03 - March</option>
						    <option value="04">04 - April</option>
						    <option value="05">05 - May</option>
						    <option value="06">06 - June</option>
						    <option value="07">07 - July</option>
						    <option value="08">08 - August</option>
						    <option value="09">09 - September</option>
						    <option value="10">10 - October</option>
						    <option value="11">11 - November</option>
						    <option value="12">12 - December</option>
						</select>
					</div>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="payment-cc-month">Expiration Year</label>
						<select id="payment-cc-month" required />
							<option value="00">Choose Year</option>
							<option value="2014">2014</option>
						    <option value="2015">2015</option>
						    <option value="2016">2016</option>
						    <option value="2017">2017</option>
						    <option value="2018">2018</option>
						    <option value="2019">2019</option>
						    <option value="2019">2020</option>
						</select>
					</div>
					<div class="message">
						Norton Secured, powered by VeriSign
					</div>
					<button class="donate-submit btn">Submit Donation</button>
				</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
		</form><!--end .donate-form-->
	</div><!-- end .lc-->
</div><!-- end .donate-slider-->

    Kids

    Lots of kids right here in our area do not get enough to eat Lorem ipsum dolor sit.

    Kids Campgign to End Hunger & call to action
    Food Drives
    Volunteer
    Pennies for Peanut Butter
    Fundrasing
    Teens Take Action

    Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank

    Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.

    1 Choose an amount to donate:
    Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.
    Next Step
    2 Enter your information:
    Next Step
    3 Enter payment information:
    Norton Secured, powered by VeriSign

					<h3><a href="#">About</a></h3>
					<ul>

					</div>

					<h3>Stay Up to Date</h3>
					<p>Stay informed about our organization, upcoming events, stories of lives we have touched and news that impacts what we do.</p>
				<form action="#" method="post" class="inline-form newsletter-form">           
				    <fieldset>
					    <legend>Sign up for our newsletter</legend>
					    <label for="newsletter-field" class="is-vishidden">Email address</label>

						</div>
				    </fieldset>
				</form>				<ul class="social-list">
					<li><a href="http://www.facebook.com/pages/Greater-Pittsburgh-Community-Food-Bank/145889928474" rel="external" target="_blank"><span class="icon-facebook"></span>Like us on Facebook</a></li>

    Join Kids Campaign to End Hunger

    Make a difference in your community Lorem ipsum dolor.

    Signup form
    Benefits

    Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank

    Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.

    1 Choose an amount to donate:
    Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.
    Next Step
    2 Enter your information:
    Next Step
    3 Enter payment information:
    Norton Secured, powered by VeriSign

    Programs

    • SNAP
    • Farm Stand Project
    • Summer Food

    Contact Us

    Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank
    1 North Linden Street
    Duquesne, PA 15110
    412-460-3663 Email us

    Stay Up to Date

    Stay informed about our organization, upcoming events, stories of lives we have touched and news that impacts what we do.

    Sign up for our newsletter
    • Like us on Facebook
    • Follow us on Twitter
    • View our videos on Youtube
    The Greater Pittsburgh Community Foodbank is a member of Feeding America
    View our Privacy Policy

<div class="donate">
	<div class="lc">
		<h2>Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
		<div class="donate-messaging-text">
			<p>Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.</p>
		</div>
		<form method="post" action="#" class="donate-form">
				<fieldset class="donate-step donate-range-container" id="donate-step-1">
					<legend><span class="form-step">1</span> Choose an amount to donate:</legend>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="donate-range" class="field-instruction is-vishidden">Choose amount to donate</label>
						<input type="number" data-type="range" class="donate-range ui-slider-input" id="donate-range" value="1" min="1" max="100" />
						<div class="donate-slider-message">Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.</div>
					</div>
					<div class="field-container checkbox-container">
						<input type="checkbox" id="donate-monthly" />
						<label for="donate-monthly">Yes, I would like to donate this amount monthly</label>
					</div>
					<a href="#donate-step-2" class="btn">Next Step</a>
				</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

				<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-2">
					<legend><span class="form-step">2</span> Enter your information:</legend>
					<div class="g g-2up">
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-name">Name</label>
							<input type="text" id="donate-name" placeholder="First Last" autocomplete="off" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-email">E-mail</label>
							<input type="email" id="donate-email" placeholder="your@email.com" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-address">Address</label>
							<input type="text" id="donate-address" placeholder="123 Main St" autocomplete="off" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-address-2">Address 2</label>

						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-city">City</label>

						</div>

						    <option value="02">02 - February</option>

						</select>

    Resources

    Learn about hunger, our mission, and more lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.

    Intro text (short and sweet)
    Touts for each resource section (Hunger, Food, Recipes, Advocacy , etc)
    Stats

    Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank

    Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.

    1 Choose an amount to donate:
    Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.
    Next Step
    2 Enter your information:
    Next Step
    3 Enter payment information:
    Norton Secured, powered by VeriSign

    Programs

    • Farm Stand Project
    • Summer Food

    Contact Us

    Duquesne, PA 15110

    Stay Up to Date

    Stay informed about our organization, upcoming events, stories of lives we have touched and news that impacts what we do.

    Sign up for our newsletter
    • Like us on Facebook
    • Follow us on Twitter
    • View our videos on Youtube
    The Greater Pittsburgh Community Foodbank is a member of Feeding America
    View our Privacy Policy
    This pattern contains: templates-resources-landing

	<div class="lc">
		<h2>Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
		<div class="donate-messaging-text">
			<p>Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.</p>
		</div>
		<form method="post" action="#" class="donate-form">
				<fieldset class="donate-step donate-range-container" id="donate-step-1">
					<legend><span class="form-step">1</span> Choose an amount to donate:</legend>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="donate-range" class="field-instruction is-vishidden">Choose amount to donate</label>
						<input type="number" data-type="range" class="donate-range ui-slider-input" id="donate-range" value="1" min="1" max="100" />
						<div class="donate-slider-message">Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.</div>
					</div>
					<div class="field-container checkbox-container">
						<input type="checkbox" id="donate-monthly" />
						<label for="donate-monthly">Yes, I would like to donate this amount monthly</label>
					</div>
					<a href="#donate-step-2" class="btn">Next Step</a>
				</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

				<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-2">
					<legend><span class="form-step">2</span> Enter your information:</legend>
					<div class="g g-2up">
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-name">Name</label>

						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-email">E-mail</label>
							<input type="email" id="donate-email" placeholder="your@email.com" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-address">Address</label>

						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-address-2">Address 2</label>

						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-city">City</label>

						</div>

						<label for="payment-cc-num">CVV Number</label>

    Frequently Asked Questions

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Fuga, architecto enim commodi laboriosam quibusdam cupiditate.

    FAQ list

    Resources

    • FAQ
    • About Hunger
    • Hunger Profiles
    • Food Sources
    • Advocacy Information
    • Links
    Stat

    Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank

    Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.

    1 Choose an amount to donate:
    Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.
    Next Step
    2 Enter your information:
    Next Step
    3 Enter payment information:
    Norton Secured, powered by VeriSign

    HTML

    									
										<div class="page" id="page">
	<!-- Begin .header -->
	<header class="header cf" role="banner">
	<a href="/"><img src="../../images/logo.gif" class="logo" alt="Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank" /></a>		<a href="#search-form" class="nav-toggle nav-toggle-search icon-search"><span class="is-vishidden">Search</span></a>

		    <legend class="is-vishidden">Search</legend>

			</li>
			<li class="nav-li">
				<a href="#" class="nav-subnav-link">About<span class="icon-arrow-down5"></span></a>

<div class="donate">
	<div class="lc">
		<h2>Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
		<div class="donate-messaging-text">
			<p>Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.</p>
		</div>
		<form method="post" action="#" class="donate-form">
				<fieldset class="donate-step donate-range-container" id="donate-step-1">
					<legend><span class="form-step">1</span> Choose an amount to donate:</legend>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="donate-range" class="field-instruction is-vishidden">Choose amount to donate</label>

						<div class="donate-slider-message">Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.</div>
					</div>
					<div class="field-container checkbox-container">
						<input type="checkbox" id="donate-monthly" />

					</div>

				</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

    Resource Detail

    Information about the resource (like About Hunger) lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.

    Resource description (copy, list of links, etc)

    Stat

    Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank

    Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.

    1 Choose an amount to donate:
    Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.
    Next Step
    2 Enter your information:
    Next Step
    3 Enter payment information:
    Norton Secured, powered by VeriSign

    • Farm Stand Project
    • Summer Food

    • Agency Relations

    Contact Us

    Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank
    1 North Linden Street
    Duquesne, PA 15110
    412-460-3663 Email us

    Stay Up to Date

    Stay informed about our organization, upcoming events, stories of lives we have touched and news that impacts what we do.

    Sign up for our newsletter
    • Like us on Facebook
    • Follow us on Twitter
    • View our videos on Youtube
    The Greater Pittsburgh Community Foodbank is a member of Feeding America

							<ul class="section-subnav">
							</ul>
						</li>
					</ul>
				</nav>
			</div><!--end .l-sidebar-->
			<div class="l-sidebar2">
				<div class="fpo">Stat</div>
			</div><!--end .l-sidebar2-->
		</div><!--end .l-3col-->
		
		
	</div><!--End role=main-->
<div class="donate">
	<div class="lc">
		<h2>Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
		<div class="donate-messaging-text">
			<p>Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.</p>
		</div>
		<form method="post" action="#" class="donate-form">
				<fieldset class="donate-step donate-range-container" id="donate-step-1">
					<legend><span class="form-step">1</span> Choose an amount to donate:</legend>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="donate-range" class="field-instruction is-vishidden">Choose amount to donate</label>
						<input type="number" data-type="range" class="donate-range ui-slider-input" id="donate-range" value="1" min="1" max="100" />
						<div class="donate-slider-message">Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.</div>
					</div>
					<div class="field-container checkbox-container">
						<input type="checkbox" id="donate-monthly" />
						<label for="donate-monthly">Yes, I would like to donate this amount monthly</label>
					</div>
					<a href="#donate-step-2" class="btn">Next Step</a>
				</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

				<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-2">
					<legend><span class="form-step">2</span> Enter your information:</legend>
					<div class="g g-2up">
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-name">Name</label>
							<input type="text" id="donate-name" placeholder="First Last" autocomplete="off" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-email">E-mail</label>
							<input type="email" id="donate-email" placeholder="your@email.com" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-address">Address</label>
							<input type="text" id="donate-address" placeholder="123 Main St" autocomplete="off" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-address-2">Address 2</label>
							<input type="text" id="donate-address-2" placeholder="Apt #, Suite, etc" autocomplete="off" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-city">City</label>
							<input type="text" id="donate-city" placeholder="Pittsburgh" autocomplete="off" required />
						</div>
						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-state">State</label>
							<select id="donate-state" name="donate-state" required>
								<option value="AL">Alabama</option>

					<a href="#donate-step-3" class="btn">Next Step</a>
				</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

					<legend><span class="form-step">3</span> Enter payment information:</legend>
					<div class="field-container radio-container">

					</div>

						    <option value="02">02 - February</option>

    Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank

    Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.

    1 Choose an amount to donate:
    Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.
    Next Step
    2 Enter your information:
    Next Step
    3 Enter payment information:
    Norton Secured, powered by VeriSign

	<div class="lc">

								<option value="AR">Arkansas</option>

								<option value="CO">Colorado</option>
								<option value="CT">Connecticut</option>
								<option value="DE">Delaware</option>
								<option value="DC">District of Columbia</option>
								<option value="FL">Florida</option>
								<option value="GA">Georgia</option>
								<option value="HI">Hawaii</option>

								<option value="IL">Illinois</option>
								<option value="IN">Indiana</option>

								<option value="NC">North Carolina</option>
								<option value="ND">North Dakota</option>
								<option value="OH">Ohio</option>
								<option value="OK">Oklahoma</option>
								<option value="OR">Oregon</option>
								<option value="PA" selected="selected">Pennsylvania</option>
								<option value="RI">Rhode Island</option>
								<option value="SC">South Carolina</option>
								<option value="SD">South Dakota</option>
								<option value="TN">Tennessee</option>
								<option value="TX">Texas</option>
								<option value="UT">Utah</option>

								<option value="WV">West Virginia</option>
								<option value="WI">Wisconsin</option>
								<option value="WY">Wyoming</option>
							</select>
						</div>
					</div><!--end .g-2up-->
					<a href="#donate-step-3" class="btn">Next Step</a>
				</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

				<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-3">
					<legend><span class="form-step">3</span> Enter payment information:</legend>
					<div class="field-container radio-container">
						<input type="radio" name="payment-type" id="payment-cc" /><label for="payment-cc">Credit Card</label>
						<input type="radio" name="payment-type" id="payment-bank" /><label for="payment-bank">Bank Account</label>
					</div>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="payment-cc-num">Credit Card Number</label>
						<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="payment-cc-num" placeholder="Enter Credit Card Number" required />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="payment-cc-num">CVV Number</label>
						<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="payment-cc-cvv" placeholder="123" required />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="payment-cc-month">Expiration Month</label>
						<select id="payment-cc-month" required />
							<option value="00">Choose Month</option>
							<option value="01">01 - January</option>
						    <option value="02">02 - February</option>
						    <option value="03">03 - March</option>

						</select>
					</div>

					</div>

	</div><!-- end .lc-->

    Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank

    Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.

    1 Choose an amount to donate:
    Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.
    Next Step
    2 Enter your information:
    Next Step
    3 Enter payment information:
    Norton Secured, powered by VeriSign

<div class="donate">
	<div class="lc">
		<h2>Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
		<div class="donate-messaging-text">
			<p>Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.</p>
		</div>
		<form method="post" action="#" class="donate-form">
				<fieldset class="donate-step donate-range-container" id="donate-step-1">
					<legend><span class="form-step">1</span> Choose an amount to donate:</legend>
					<div class="field-container">

					</div>

					</div>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="payment-cc-num">Credit Card Number</label>
						<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="payment-cc-num" placeholder="Enter Credit Card Number" required />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="payment-cc-num">CVV Number</label>
						<input type="number" pattern="[0-9]*" id="payment-cc-cvv" placeholder="123" required />
					</div>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="payment-cc-month">Expiration Month</label>
						<select id="payment-cc-month" required />
							<option value="00">Choose Month</option>
							<option value="01">01 - January</option>
						    <option value="02">02 - February</option>
						    <option value="03">03 - March</option>
						    <option value="04">04 - April</option>
						    <option value="05">05 - May</option>
						    <option value="06">06 - June</option>
						    <option value="07">07 - July</option>
						    <option value="08">08 - August</option>
						    <option value="09">09 - September</option>
						    <option value="10">10 - October</option>
						    <option value="11">11 - November</option>
						    <option value="12">12 - December</option>
						</select>
					</div>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="payment-cc-month">Expiration Year</label>
						<select id="payment-cc-month" required />
							<option value="00">Choose Year</option>
							<option value="2014">2014</option>
						    <option value="2015">2015</option>
						    <option value="2016">2016</option>
						    <option value="2017">2017</option>
						    <option value="2018">2018</option>
						    <option value="2019">2019</option>
						    <option value="2019">2020</option>
						</select>
					</div>
					<div class="message">
						Norton Secured, powered by VeriSign
					</div>
					<button class="donate-submit btn">Submit Donation</button>
				</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->
		</form><!--end .donate-form-->
	</div><!-- end .lc-->
</div><!-- end .donate-slider-->
	<!-- Begin Footer -->
	<footer class="footer" role="contentinfo">

    Contact

    Find help, reach our departments, volunteer, and more Lorem ipsum dolor.

    Emergency food information
    Address (link to directions), phone number, fax, email
    Donate number and link
    Phone directory
    Directions

    Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank

    Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.

    1 Choose an amount to donate:
    Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.
    Next Step
    2 Enter your information:
    Next Step
    3 Enter payment information:
    Norton Secured, powered by VeriSign

					<a href="#" class="text-btn">View all news</a>
				</div>
			</div>
		</nav>
			<hr />

				<div class="gi">
					<h3>Contact Us</h3>
					<div class="vcard">

					<h3>Stay Up to Date</h3>
					<p>Stay informed about our organization, upcoming events, stories of lives we have touched and news that impacts what we do.</p>
				<form action="#" method="post" class="inline-form newsletter-form">           
				    <fieldset>

					    <label for="newsletter-field" class="is-vishidden">Email address</label>

					    	<button class="newsletter-submit">Sign Up</button>
						</div>
				    </fieldset>
				</form>				<ul class="social-list">
					<li><a href="http://www.facebook.com/pages/Greater-Pittsburgh-Community-Food-Bank/145889928474" rel="external" target="_blank"><span class="icon-facebook"></span>Like us on Facebook</a></li>

    404 Page Not Found

    Brief Explanation
    Common links (homepage, get help, give help, etc)

    Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank

    Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.

    1 Choose an amount to donate:
    Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.
    Next Step
    2 Enter your information:
    Next Step
    3 Enter payment information:
    Norton Secured, powered by VeriSign

    Programs

    Contact Us

    Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank
    1 North Linden Street
    Duquesne, PA 15110
    412-460-3663 Email us

    Stay Up to Date

    Stay informed about our organization, upcoming events, stories of lives we have touched and news that impacts what we do.

    Sign up for our newsletter
    • Like us on Facebook
    • Follow us on Twitter
    • View our videos on Youtube
    The Greater Pittsburgh Community Foodbank is a member of Feeding America

<div class="donate">
	<div class="lc">
		<h2>Donate to the Greater Pittsburgh Community Food Bank</h2>
		<div class="donate-messaging-text">
			<p>Over 92,000 children in southwestern Pennsylvania don't have enough food to live a normal, healthy life. You can help fix this.</p>
		</div>
		<form method="post" action="#" class="donate-form">
				<fieldset class="donate-step donate-range-container" id="donate-step-1">
					<legend><span class="form-step">1</span> Choose an amount to donate:</legend>
					<div class="field-container">
						<label for="donate-range" class="field-instruction is-vishidden">Choose amount to donate</label>
						<input type="number" data-type="range" class="donate-range ui-slider-input" id="donate-range" value="1" min="1" max="100" />
						<div class="donate-slider-message">Every dollar helps. 96% of donated money goes directly to feeding the hungry.</div>
					</div>
					<div class="field-container checkbox-container">

					</div>
					<a href="#donate-step-2" class="btn">Next Step</a>
				</fieldset><!--end .donate-step-->

				<fieldset class="donate-step" id="donate-step-2">

						<div class="field-container gi">
							<label for="donate-name">Name</label>

						</div>

						</div>
